DOC.brief_summary: Studies show sharp posterior optic edge intraocular lens ( IOL ) inhibit migration lens epithelial cell posterior capsule optic IOL therefore reduces rate posterior capsule opacification ( PCO ) . In present time IOLs implant sharp posterior optic edge . Due difference IOL production different IOLs different rate PCO . Progression cataract surgery technique allow phacoemulsification micro-incisions . Therefore need IOLs implant incision 2.5 mm . This study investigate effect two different hydrophobic acrylic IOLs sharp posterior optic edge rate PCO implantation micro-incision . The result compare intraindividually .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Two Different Preloaded Intraocular Lens ( IOLs ) Posterior Capsule Opacification
DOC.detailed_description: prospective , randomize , bilateral study intraindividual comparison , implantation Polylens Y10 IOL one eye implantation Polylens Y30 contralateral eye . PCO rate detect 1 year 2 year .
DOC.criteria: bilateral agerelated cataract age 55 80 year expect postoperative visual acuity least 0.5 amblyopia corneal scar diabetes pseudoexfoliationsyndrome early ocular surgery laser treatment intraocular tumor
